title: Identify Functional Groups
text: Look at the functional groups present in each molecule. What functional group does each molecule have?

title: Hydrogen Bonding
text: Which functional group is capable of forming hydrogen bonds?

title: Boiling Point and Intermolecular Forces
text: Remember that stronger intermolecular forces lead to higher boiling points. Which molecule has stronger intermolecular forces?

title: Compare the Molecules
text: Compare the ability of each molecule to form hydrogen bonds. Which one can form hydrogen bonds?

hintAnswer: Compound Y will have higher boiling point because it can form hydrogen bonding
title: Determine the Higher Boiling Point
text: Based on the ability to form hydrogen bonds, which compound will have a higher boiling point?
choices: Compound X will have higher boiling point because it can form hydrogen bonding
Compound Y will have higher boiling point because it can form hydrogen bonding
Compound X will have higher boiling point because it can form dipole dipole interaction
